data.title: Cynthia Marlenee, wife of Congressman Ron Marlenee, passes away
data.meta_description: Cynthia S. Marlenee, wife of former Montana Congressman Ron Marlenee, passed away on Aug. 22, 2023.An obituary states Marlenee was battling Progressive Supranuc
data.text:
Summary by Ground News

Cindy Suzanne Marlenee of Bozeman, Montana passed away peacefully in her sleep after a short battle with Progressive Supranuclear Palsy. She was under the care of Stillwater Hospice. A Celebration of Life in Montana and another in Minnesota will be set at a later date.

Cynthia Marlenee, wife of Congressman Ron Marlenee, passes away

Cynthia S. Marlenee, wife of former Montana Congressman Ron Marlenee, passed away on Aug. 22, 2023.An obituary states Marlenee was battling Progressive Supranuclear Palsy.Cynthia married Congressman Marlenee in 1978 and became the Founder of the Sportsman National Congressional Caucus and served as the second Chairman. Cindy worked as a legislative lobbyist for Safari Club International alongside her husband, Ron, after he left Congress in 1992.…

1 year ago
